Detailed Description

XHTML extension of AbstractSitePage. Provides context for XHTML Web Pages.

XHTMLSitePage::OnLoad (   ) 
 

callback function to be called by Application on ApplicationStart. Initializes the page with an XHTMLPageTemplate.

Definition at line 66 of file XHTMLSitePage.php.

XHTMLSitePage::OnUnLoad (  $  applicationVars  ) 
 

callback function to be called by Application on ApplicationEnd. Sets up Execution time from Tag named TAG_EXECUTION_TIME and flushes the page.

Parameters:
$applicationVars arguments passed by Application on function call - see Application class
See also:
Application class
